content.json:
## BIOS update report (for Lenovo devices)
---
This workbook allows you to know:
- BIOS update status
- BIOS versions details on devices
- Devices with old BIOS versions
- Old BIOS versions per model & top 10 devices
- Devices with BIOS older than 2 years
- What take more space on those devices

parameters.name: ComputerModel
parameters.label: Filter on device model
parameters.query:
GRT_BIOSUpate_CL
| where ScriptStatus_s == "Success"
| where BIOSUpToDate_s == "No"
| where ModelFamilyName_s <> ""
| distinct ModelFamilyName_s

content.query:
GRT_BIOSUpate_CL
| where ScriptStatus_s == "Success"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ComputerName_s
| summarize GRT_BIOSUpate_CL = count() by BIOSUpToDate_s, ModelFamilyName_s, ChassisType_s
| where ModelFamilyName_s has_any ({ComputerModel})
content.title: BIOS update status

content.query:
GRT_BIOSUpate_CL
| where ScriptStatus_s == "Success"
| where BIOSUpToDate_s == "No"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ComputerName_s
| summarize GRT_BIOSUpate_CL = count() by ModelFamilyName_s
| where ModelFamilyName_s has_any ({ComputerModel})
content.title: Devices with BIOS not uptodate (per model)

content.query:
GRT_BIOSUpate_CL
| where ScriptStatus_s == "Success"
| where BIOSUpToDate_s == "No"
| where DateDiffDelay_s <> ""
| where DateDiffDelay_s <> "730"
| where DateDiffDelay_s <> "1_365"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ComputerName_s
| summarize GRT_BIOSUpate_CL = count() by DateDiffDelay_s, ModelFamilyName_s
| where ModelFamilyName_s has_any ({ComputerModel})
content.title: Devices with BIOS not updated since

content.query:
GRT_BIOSUpate_CL
| where ScriptStatus_s == "Success"
| where BIOSUpToDate_s == "No"
| where ChassisType_s <> ""
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ComputerName_s
| summarize GRT_BIOSUpate_CL = count() by ChassisType_s
content.title: Devices with BIOS not uptodate (per chassis)

content.query:
GRT_BIOSUpate_CL
| where ScriptStatus_s == "Success"
| where BIOSUpToDate_s == "No"
| where BIOSVersionModel_s <> ""
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ComputerName_s
| summarize GRT_BIOSUpate_CL = count() by BIOSVersionModel_s, ModelFamilyName_s
| where ModelFamilyName_s has_any ({ComputerModel})
content.title: Devices count per BIOS version

parameters.name: ChassisType
parameters.label: Filter on chassis
parameters.description: Filter devices on chassis: laptop or desktop
parameters.query:
GRT_BIOSUpate_CL
| where ScriptStatus_s == "Success"
| where BIOSUpToDate_s == "No"
| where ChassisType_s <> ""
| distinct ChassisType_s

parameters.name: ComputerModel
parameters.label: Filter on model
parameters.query:
GRT_BIOSUpate_CL
| where ScriptStatus_s == "Success"
| where BIOSUpToDate_s == "No"
| where ModelFamilyName_s <> ""
| distinct ModelFamilyName_s

content.query:
GRT_BIOSUpate_CL | top 10 by NotUpdatedSince_d desc nulls last
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ComputerName_s
| where ScriptStatus_s == "Success"
| where BIOSUpToDate_s == "No"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ComputerName_s
| project ['Last contact']=TimeGenerated, ['Not updated since (in days']=NotUpdatedSince_d, Computer=ComputerName_s,User=UserName_s, 
['Model MTM']=ModelMTM_s, Model=ModelFamilyName_s,
['Current BIOS version']=BIOSCurrentVersion_s,['New BIOS version']=BIOSNewVersion_s, Chassis=ChassisType_s
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or Computer contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| where Chassis has_any ({ChassisType})
| where Model has_any ({ComputerModel})
content.title: Top 10 devices with old BIOS

content.query:
GRT_BIOSUpate_CL
| where ScriptStatus_s == "Success"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ComputerName_s
| project ['BIOS state ?']=BIOSUpToDate_s, Computer=ComputerName_s, Chassis=ChassisType_s, User=UserName_s, 
['Model MTM']=ModelMTM_s, Model=ModelFamilyName_s, ['Not updated since (in days']=NotUpdatedSince_d,
['Current BIOS version']=BIOSCurrentVersion_s,['New BIOS version']=BIOSNewVersion_s
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or Computer contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| where Chassis has_any ({ChassisType})
| where Model has_any ({ComputerModel})
content.title: BIOS update details (uptodate and not uptodate)

content.query:
GRT_BIOSUpate_CL
| where ScriptStatus_s == "Success"
| where BIOSUpToDate_s == "No"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ComputerName_s
| project Computer=ComputerName_s,User=UserName_s, Chassis=ChassisType_s,
['Model MTM']=ModelMTM_s, Model=ModelFamilyName_s, ['Not updated since (in days']=NotUpdatedSince_d,
['Current BIOS version']=BIOSCurrentVersion_s,['New BIOS version']=BIOSNewVersion_s
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or Computer contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| where Chassis has_any ({ChassisType})
| where Model has_any ({ComputerModel})
content.title: Devices with BIOS not uptodate

content.query:
GRT_BIOSUpate_CL
| where ScriptStatus_s == "Success"
| where BIOSUpToDate_s == "No"
| where NotUpdatedSince_d > 730
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ComputerName_s
| project ['BIOS uptodate ?']=BIOSUpToDate_s, Computer=ComputerName_s,User=UserName_s, 
['Model MTM']=ModelMTM_s, Model=ModelFamilyName_s, ['Not updated since (in days']=NotUpdatedSince_d,
['Current BIOS version']=BIOSCurrentVersion_s,['New BIOS version']=BIOSNewVersion_s, Chassis=ChassisType_s
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or Computer contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| where Chassis has_any ({ChassisType})
| where Model has_any ({ComputerModel})
content.title: Devices with BIOS > 2 years
